bug.author: YangHan-Morningstar
bug.description: When I use the TTS demo in Colab, I got an error which is "fatal: Remote branch fix_import not found in upstream origin"in git clone. Could you tell me how to solve it? Thanks a lot!

comments.comment: Sorry, this is my fault. To quick fix, please change the line as follows: !git clone -q https://github.com/kan-bayashi/espnet.git -b fix_import to !git clone -q https://github.com/espnet/espnet.git I will fix lator.
